citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:00 am on
11-Dec-18.
The inspector was informed by a family member that the licensee was away from the facility and would not be
available until late afternoon. No other authorized person was available for inspection.
